title: Infer Keyword Visualization
description: Add tracing/visualization for TypeScript's `infer` keyword across all contexts (template literals, function return types, array elements, object properties). Show all recursive steps with full bindings.
close_reason: All phases complete: trace types, colors, findInferTypes(), extractInferredBindings(), evaluateConditional integration, template literal guard, all infer contexts supported, tests passing

title: Infer info not shown in right panel
description: After implementing infer keyword visualization, the infer binding info (e.g., Head = "foo", Tail = "bar") is not being displayed in the right panel during stepping. The trace entries are generated but not rendered in the UI.
close_reason: Created InferPatternSection component to display infer pattern/match/binding info in right panel

title: Fix App integration tests (3 failing)
description:
Tests failing with async/timing issues. Getting "act(...)" warnings.

Failing tests:
- hides editor after Debug button is clicked
- editor remains hidden after successful generation
- shows only TypeDefinition and StepDetails panels after generation (no editor)
close_reason: Fixed 3 App integration tests - changed visibility checks to verify CSS margin-based hiding instead of DOM removal

title: Fix UI test failures
description:
25 UI tests failing across 4 test files. Root causes:
1. CallStackSection tests expect full expression but component shows only type name
2. GlobalsSection tests have similar text matching issues
3. StepDetailsPanel tests inherit CallStackSection issues
4. App integration tests have async/timing issues
close_reason: Epic complete - all 25 UI tests fixed across 4 test files

title: Implement extractInferredBindings() + context fields
description:
Phase 2: Pattern Extraction
- Implement extractInferredBindings() using TS type checker
- Add inferredBindings + currentInferPattern to EvalContext
close_reason: Implemented extractInferredBindings() in eval_local.ts

title: Fix step count to be 0-based instead of 1-based
description: Step count in trace is starting at 1 but should start at 0
close_reason: Step count now 0-based (changed context.trace.length + 1 to context.trace.length)

title: Preserve shared URL querystring after loading
description: Currently when loading from a shared URL, the code/typeName querystring params are removed from the URL. Should preserve them so the URL can be re-shared.
close_reason: Fixed: Removed URL param deletion after loading shared state (App.tsx:46-48). URL now preserves code/typeName querystring for re-sharing.

title: Call stack is overly verbose
description: The call stack panel shows too much detail. It should only show the list of called generics (type aliases being evaluated) rather than every trace step. Makes it hard to follow the evaluation flow.
close_reason: Fixed: Call stack now only shows generic_call, generic_def, and type_alias_start entries for cleaner display

title: Show/hide editor toggle not working
description: The show/hide editor toggle button no longer works. The editor visibility should toggle when clicked.
close_reason: Fixed: Removed `&& !hasGenerated` condition from App.tsx line 140 that prevented editor from showing after generation

title: Fix GlobalsSection tests (11 failing)
description:
Tests failing with text matching issues. Need to investigate actual rendered output vs test expectations.

Failing tests:
- lists all used type names in monospace font
- does not display unused types by default (Show Used mode)
- toggles to show all types when "Show All" clicked
- displays unused types with dimmed styling in Show All mode
- hides unused types again when "Show Used" clicked
- calls onTypeClick with type name when type clicked
- allows clicking unused types in Show All mode
- handles all types being used
- collapses and expands section when header clicked
- does not crash when onTypeClick not provided
- handles single used and single unused type
close_reason: Fixed 11 GlobalsSection tests - changed exact text matches to regex patterns to match rendered type names with generics

title: Fix StepDetailsPanel integration tests (5 failing)
description:
Tests depend on CallStackSection rendering which has its own issues.

Failing tests:
- renders CallStackSection with steps data
- renders Expression in CollapsibleSection
- calls onSeekToStep when call stack frame clicked
- passes all steps to CallStackSection
- handles nested call stack with parameters at each level
close_reason: Fixed 5 StepDetailsPanel tests - updated to use CALL_STACK_TYPES and regex patterns to match actual rendering

title: Handle all infer contexts
description:
Phase 5: All Infer Contexts
- Function return type: T extends (...args) => infer R
- Array element: T extends (infer E)[]
- Object property: T extends { data: infer D }
- Tuple: T extends [infer First, ...infer Rest]
close_reason: Implementation uses TS type checker which natively handles all infer contexts (function, array, object, tuple)

title: Fix CallStackSection tests (6 failing)
description:
Tests expect full expression like `Loop2<"a" | "b" | "x">` but buildCallStack extracts just `Loop2`. Tests need updating to match actual implementation behavior.

Failing tests:
- displays single frame with line number
- displays nested call stack with proper indentation
- calls onNavigateToStep when frame is clicked
- displays frame without line number when position is missing
- displays multi-level nested stack
- handles navigation to frame at different depth
close_reason: Fixed 6 CallStackSection tests - updated regex patterns to match actual component behavior (type names only, not full expressions)

title: Duplicate trace steps - step N and N+1 identical except result
description: Looking at tests/base.ts, steps 11 and 12 are the same expression - step 12 just has the result added. This seems redundant - should either be one step with result, or the steps should show different stages. Example: getter type evaluation shows duplicate steps around step 11-12.
close_reason: Fixed: Removed redundant result_assignment step. Now branch_true/false shows branch taken, and generic_result shows final result.

title: Fix last step to return to __EvalTarget__ with result
description: The last step in evaluation doesn't go back to __EvalTarget__ with the final result
close_reason: Added type_alias_result step at end of traceTypeResolution

title: Globals panel is empty
description: The Globals panel should display top-level types/interfaces defined in the source code, but it currently shows nothing. Need to populate with type aliases, interfaces, and other declarations from the AST.
close_reason: Fixed calculateUsedTypeNames to match all known type names from typeAliases instead of only capitalized identifiers

title: Add findInferTypes() helper + trace types + colors
description:
Phase 1: Foundation
- Add findInferTypes() to detect ts.SyntaxKind.InferType nodes
- Add trace types: infer_pattern_start, infer_pattern_match, infer_binding, infer_pattern_result
- Add colors to TRACE_TYPE_COLORS
close_reason: Added trace types, colors, findInferTypes() helper, and EvalContext fields

title: Guard evaluateTemplateLiteral() for pattern context
description:
Phase 4: Template Literal Guard
- Detect infer in template literal spans
- Skip evaluation of ${infer X} spans
- Return raw pattern string when in pattern context
close_reason: Added guard to skip infer pattern evaluation in template literals

title: Add tests for infer patterns
description:
Phase 6: Testing
- Basic template literal pattern
- Multiple infer variables
- Recursive patterns (Split<"a.b.c">)
- Non-template infer (ReturnType)
- Failed pattern match
- Union distribution with infer
close_reason: All 8 infer tests pass, full suite (112 tests) passes

title: Modify evaluateConditional() for infer detection
description:
Phase 3: Conditional Integration
- Detect infer in extends clause
- Add infer_pattern_start trace
- Extract bindings via TS checker
- Add infer_pattern_match trace (success/fail)
- Add infer_binding trace for each variable
- Inject bindings into context.parameters
- Clean up bindings after branch eval
close_reason: Added infer detection, pattern matching, binding extraction, and cleanup in evaluateConditional()
